mapper.select: select d.idx, nickname, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date, b_code, label, u_idx, style, b_idx, ori_filename, save_filename, thumb, upload_type from doc_storage_${url} d join (select idx, nickname, title, content, w_date, b_code, b.label, u_idx, style from board_${url} b join label_${url} l on b.label = l.label) a on d.idx = a.idx order by idx
mapper.insert: insert all into board_${url} (idx, nickname, title, content, b_code, label, u_idx) values (board_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${nickname}', '${title}', '${content}', '${b_code}', '${label}', '${u_idx}') into doc_storage_${url} (b_idx, ori_filename, save_filename, thumb, idx, upload_type) values (doc_storage_d_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${ori_filename}', '${save_filename}', '${thumb}', board_idx_seq_${url}.CURRVAL, '${upload_type}') select * from dual

insert all into board_${url} (idx, nickname, title, content, b_code, label, u_idx) values (board_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${nickname}', '${title}', '${content}', '${b_code}', '${label}', '${u_idx}') into doc_storage_${url} (b_idx, ori_filename, save_filename, thumb, idx, upload_type) values (doc_storage_d_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${ori_filename}', '${save_filename}', '${thumb}', board_idx_seq_${url}.CURRVAL, '${upload_type}') select * from dual
